participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Determined and health-conscious, Emily is always up for a challenge and motivates others to stay fit.
participant_1.background: i am a clean eater. my parents were both very athletic. i love running and preparing for marathons. i am a cancer survivor.

participant_2.name: Michael
participant_2.personality: Hardworking and practical, Michael loves creating things and takes pride in his craftsmanship.
participant_2.background: my dad taught me everything i know. i'm a construction worker. my cats are very special to me. i've 5cats. i enjoy building houses.
